channel.title: -Comeback- Can I get a few pointers please?
channel.description:
Okay. So this is a low priority thing. But I have recently wanted to come back to RSPS. I can now host servers which got me really excited since I have never been able to configure it correctly. And Also backed with 2 more years of C# programming. So my question is. Can you guys just give me a few pointers as to where some of the code is located within the server? Such as Teleports. Interface Button Commands. etc. I just would like to change where portals teleport you, where items and objects are, and what some of the buttons like Game Tele in the magebook say and do. Thanks in advance to anybody helps. All help is appreciated. I kinda just forgot where the stuff is.
And also. Where shop items are located. So I can change the shops and their locations and such. *EDIT*

item.title: -Comeback- Can I get a few pointers please?
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:9, topic:385340”][quote author=austinsobes link=topic=481094.msg3522766#msg3522766 date=1299535453]

tell me the link of what source you downloaded ill tell you

Downloaded 3+ months ago. All I know is that the previous Coder/Owner was Owner Kid and IC3. The contents of the entire server were switched to YourServer. Except a few places. Where it was referred to as RuneWorld. Hope that helps any. I’ve been searching for Project Insanity sources for the last 20 minutes. Only legit post I could find had a broken link.
[/quote]
theres tons of pi sources are you kidding me?
heres some lol that i found within 20 secs top one is mine ive tested the other 4 also they work i didnt use them but ive tested b4

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Thanks a bunch. I guess I’ve lost my Runescape touch. I used to be extremely fitted back when I was like 11 doing this lol.

item.title: -Comeback- Can I get a few pointers please?
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

mr extremez:

are you using delta?

I’m not sure. I haven’t been coding long with RSPS. And when I did. The only different between Delta and anything else to my knowledge was the Client window. But the format that I see in the programming is very familiar and very old to me. So I would assume it would be delta. It’s all I’ve ever worked with.

Read full topic

item.title: -Comeback- Can I get a few pointers please?
item.dc:creator: @austinsobes austinsobes
item.description:
@austinsobes wrote:

x1 att ftw x:

you can look in client.java over there you can change where portals teleport you and can add and remove objects and also make commands, basicly most of ur coding starts there

I know this. I have changed and edited most of the commands. Messages and rules lists. I’ve also changed the starter gear. But Would I would like to know is what to search for. Like for objects. Isn’t it addObject(ID, LocationX, LocationY);?
Or at least something similiar? And also, if I remember correctly, Isn’t there also some sort of Switch statement used for shops as well?

Read full topic
